name: SouthPointFinancialCreditUnion
0:
”Alexa open SouthPoint Financial Credit Union”
”Alexa ask SouthPoint Financial Credit Union for balance”
”Alexa ask SouthPoint Financial Credit Union for transactions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: southpoint financial credit union
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now stay on top of your finances with the Southpoint Financial Credit Union skill. You can ask Alexa for balances and recent transactions.

Once you've enabled the skill, you can ask such questions as:
 - "What's my checking account balance?"
 - "What are my recent transactions?"
 - "What are my account balances?"
Use of this skill will allow financial information to be read aloud or displayed visually.
